title: How to revert back to League Legacy on Mac?
body:
Hi guys,
So I am currently playing on a Mac. I'm running the Beta version so is there anyway that I could revert it back to the old one?

replies.body:
To revert the files **entirely** you'll have to cleanly reinstall League using [this guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends#section-mac) If you'd simply rather *use the Legacy Client*, you can access it from the login screen, as shown below:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
